channel.title: One Minute Icelandic
channel.itunes:summary:
Learn Icelandic in minutes!
How would you like to be able to use the basics of Icelandic confidently and accurately? With One Minute Icelandic you can learn to do just that in short, easy-to-follow video lessons. You’ll learn just enough Icelandic to express yourself in a variety of situations, and the course is the perfect starting point to get a taste of this wonderful language.
channel.itunes:author: Coffee Break Languages
channel.description:

channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Icelandic in Minutes

item.title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Icelandic
item.itunes:title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Icelandic
item.description:
This lesson introduces a number of phrases which will come in useful when speaking with Icelandic-speaking friends.

One Minute Icelandic is released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you’d like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Icelandic is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.

item.itunes:subtitle: Learn to say “happy birthday” and lots more in Icelandic

item.title: Lesson 4 - One Minute Icelandic

item.description:

One Minute Icelandic is released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you’d like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

item.title: Lesson 1 - One Minute Icelandic
item.itunes:title: Lesson 1 - One Minute Icelandic
item.description:
In this episode of One Minute Icelandic you'll learn to say "hello" and "goodbye". 

One Minute Icelandic is released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you'd like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Icelandic is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.

item.title: One Minute Icelandic - Season Preview
item.itunes:title: One Minute Icelandic - Season Preview
item.description:
Join Ásta and Mark to find out more about our new podcast, One Minute Icelandic.

Episodes are released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you'd like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Icelandic is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.

item.title: Introducing the One Minute Icelandic Podcast
item.itunes:title: Introducing the One Minute Icelandic Podcast
item.description:
Coming soon: learn Icelandic in minutes with One Minute Icelandic. Join the Coffee Break team for an espresso shot of Icelandic.

Episodes are released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you'd like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Icelandic is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.
